Default Pagination

Simple pagination inspired by Rdio, great for apps and search results. The large block is hard to miss, easily scalable, and provides large click areas.

  • Previous
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • Next
Bootstrap docs 
<nav>
  <ul class="pagination">
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-left-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous</span></a></li>
    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-right-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Next</span></a></li>
  </ul>
</nav>

Disabled and active states

Links are customizable for different circumstances. Use .disabled for unclickable links and .active to indicate the current page.

You can optionally swap out active or disabled anchors for <span>, or omit the anchor in the case of the previous/next arrows, to remove click functionality while retaining intended styles.

  • Previous
  • 1 (current)
  • 2
  • 3
  • …
  • 35
  • Next
Bootstrap docs 
<nav>
  <ul class="pagination">
    <li class="disabled"><a href="#"><span class="arrow-left-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous</span></a></li>
    <li class="active"><a href="#">1 <span class="sr-only">(current)</span></a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li class="disabled"><span>&hellip;</span></li>
    <li><a href="#">35</a></li>
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-right-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Next</span></a></li>
  </ul>
</nav>

Sizing

Fancy larger or smaller pagination? Add .pagination-lg or .pagination-sm for additional sizes.

    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">5</a></li>
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-right-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Next</span></a></li>
  </ul>
</nav>
<nav>
  <ul class="pagination">
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-left-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous</span></a></li>

    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>

</nav>
<nav>
  <ul class="pagination pagination-sm">
    <li><a href="#"><span class="arrow-left-equilateral" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="sr-only">Previous</span></a></li>
    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
